definition: Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
(bound form) crass/stupid/rude/(used to represent the sounds of "ru", "lu" etc in loanwords)
surname Lu/Lu, ancient state of China 魯國|鲁国[Lu3 guo2]/Lu, short name for Shandong 山東|山东[Shan1 dong1]
abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan

sentences.english: The Baton Rouge Zoo is in the process of being updated.
sentences.chinese: 巴吞魯日在動物園被更新的過程。

sentences.english: She said she had to stay in Baton Rouge and work.
sentences.chinese: 她說她要留在巴吞魯日工作。

sentences.english: Clarence in Baton Rouge Cajun and radio programs Zydeco.
sentences.chinese: 克拉倫斯的巴吞魯日的凱郡和齊德科電臺節目。

sentences.english: I moved home to Baton Rouge and continued working in graphic arts.
sentences.chinese: 我提出回家巴吞魯日，並繼續工作在印藝。
